/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a human element to the scene. In the distance, a construction site is visible, a testament to the city's continuous growth and development.
